C

Cemetery - Class in model
Whenever a figure is beaten it is put on the cemetery.
Cemetery() - Constructor for class model.Cemetery
This method creates a list which shows the names of the beaten figures.
CHECK_MSG_1 - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The first part of the output message when a player is in check followed by the color.
CHECK_MSG_2_1 - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The second part of the output message when a player is in check for white.
CHECK_MSG_2_2 - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The second part of the output message when a player is in check for black.
CHECK_MSG_3 - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The third part of the output message when a player is in check after the color.
CHOOSE_COLOR - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The text for choosing the color of player one in the menu.
CHOOSE_ENEMY - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The text for choosing the opponent in the menu.
CHOOSE_LANGUAGE - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The text for choosing the language in the menu (currently German and English).
CHOOSE_MODE - Static variable in class schach.Constants
The text for choosing the game mode in the menu.
clearMovePos() - Method in class model.Board
This method sets the initial move possibilities to the default values.
Computer - Class in model
This class present an AI-player as as second player.
Computer() - Constructor for class model.Computer
 
Console - Class in view
This class is for the console-mode and print all the changes to the console.
Console() - Constructor for class view.Console
The constructor initializes the scanner and creates a new game.
ConsoleStub - Class in stubs
 
ConsoleStub() - Constructor for class stubs.ConsoleStub
 
Constants - Class in schach
A class that contains all the constant values for the game.
Constants() - Constructor for class schach.Constants
 
Controller - Class in controller
This class processes the player's inputs in the game and modifies the model.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
 
Controller(ViewInterface) - Constructor for class controller.Controller
The controller gets the view.
ControllerInterface - Interface in controller
The controller interface.
